Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find of it any cause, then you envelop that to the belly after.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then you take a needle in which be thick thread made of x threads, and enter that through the behind of the cyphaqueth, which is below the cord of the testicles, which is called section; and then incise the extremities which emerge from the thread until they are four threads, and then compose some of them on some figure in manner of cross; and tie with that the cyphaqueth of which we have said that is after the cord of the testicles with strong binding of two parts.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then envelop the extremities of the threads and tie those with vehement binding until some of the vessels that nourish those no longer can transmit any cause so that from here no abscess occur.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And pause another binding according to for the first binding, long from it less three fingers; and then these two bindings leave from the cyphaqueth which is after the cord of the testicles the quantity of the greatness of the finger, and incise all the remaining according to roundness, and take out of it the huou.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then incise in the part after the cord of the testicles by section of which runs blood and heals as we have recommended in that which we have said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then administer wool submerged in oil, and place in the wound; and administer the binding which we have recommended (and sometimes the white cyphaqueth is cauterized, which we have said near the incision fear of blood flow, because many times those occur) and leave the binding until that by itself it falls.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the hunting of it is late, then of hot water be embroiled, and place on that until it falls according to we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then cure the wound with the other cure of the wounds until that it be healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter .lxvi.
De hernia ventosa.	Of  ventous hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia no one has been seen that has been dared on the cure of it with iron.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first said that it is made as we have recommended in the hernia that is with vi; which is that you tie the vessels near the section over that with facility of it; and then dry in the middle place around the abscess with that which opened it, until that the vessels fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And cure the wound according to we have said until that it be healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter .lxvii.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the disrption that is made in the anguonars.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes it happens rupture in the anguonars as we have said, and emerge the place.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And do not leave to the genitals any cause of the intestines to the genitals; and if they leave, that is little; and return it in all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if it is prolonged the time with that, it is adjusted fissure in the cyphaqueth until that descends the intestine in the cyphaqueth; and it happens that by the extension of the cyphaqueth which is in the anguonars as we have said, which cause is that the cyphaqueth is extended, and then it is softened and the place is apostemat and emerges.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the care of him is with cautery as it is preceded by the narration of him.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes it is cured with iron in this manner: and the patient lies on his two hands between his thighs, and then dries the place of the rupture of the abscesses with a section according to the quantity of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then strengthen the white cloth that is under the loincloth until it is uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the ray and place it on the prominent place of the cloth, and press it to the front of the belly.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then sew the two prominent places on the edge of the ray of the cloth, and adjust with the suture one of them with the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then extract the edge of the ray, and do not cut the cloth at all, nor extend the intestine, nor any other cause as you may know in the cure of intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And then cure that with the cure of the plagues, and as you cut the threads, purify it and restore the plague until it is consolidated; because the cloth is contracted and the prominence of rupture is not adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is better in this place, because it is more proper to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter .lxviii.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	Of softening the loincloth of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	Sometimes the loincloth of the testicles in some men is softened because the flesh that is between it is softened, and it is a matter of concern regarding it.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Therefore it is necessary for him who is asked in the cure of it that he make the patient lie on his two hands, and cut all the loincloth which is softened on the natural loincloth; and then adjust the two lips with the suture.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, sew at the beginning the superfluity of the softened loincloth with three or four stitches and with firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then cut between the sutures; and then cure by the cure of the other plagues until it is healed and the threads fall.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter .lxix.
De castracio.	Of castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration in our law is forbidden, but for the reason it is told to me that I remember it in this book; and it is not necessary to remember it except in two ways, of which one is so that it is in the knowledge of the doctor when he is asked about it, that he knows the cure of it to whom it happens; and the other way is that we many times have need of castration of other animals for our benefit, such as goats, and sheep, and pigs, and similar to the animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And therefore I say that castration is done in two ways: either by attrition, or by fissure to section.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	But in that which is done by attrition, the way of the operation is that we make the beast to be cezed in warm water until its genitals are softened and are limp and that they hang.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take them with your hand until they are resolved and do not appear after the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	But in castration done by fissure and section,  when you have the beast and press the loincloth of its testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then lay the suspensory, and cut above each testicle with a section between two testicles processed.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then cut those that you have each excoriated.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave on those of the loincloth any cause, but the subtle loincloth which is on the vessels.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this way of castration is better the one done by attrition, because attrition strongly leaves no cause of the testicles for which the beast desires coyt.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then cure the plague until it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter .lxx.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	Of the cure of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men is according to two ways: one is that it appears in that which is between the testicles, in which there is a figure of a woman's cunt in which it is.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes from that comes urine which is in the loincloth of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	But in women it is a species: and it is that the cunt of the woman on the pubis is as two testicles of a man a little of all diminished at the front part as the penis of a man and two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the cure is of three species: of two of the men and of one species of the women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is that when you cut those joined flesh until the impregnation of it escapes, and then that you cure those with the cure of the other plagues.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second species of men of which you see urine which is in the loincloth of the testicles, there is no cure nor operation in it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter .xxi.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of lenting and of prominent flesh due to causes of women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Lenting is very much adjusted on natural causes while it is stressed and is made less noticeable; and sometimes it is magnified in some women to such an extent that it spreads as in men and interferes with coitus.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore, you must have the superfluity of the entrails in your hand or in a basin and incised.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And in the last incision, mostly in the front of the navel, so that no flow of blood occurs.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	And then cure that with the cure of the plagues while it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Mays carn nascuda es carn that nays in the horrifici of the mayre entro that umple aquel, and fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa of coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove that nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro that sia sanada.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter .lxxii.
De curacio de alratica.	Of the cure of alratica.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Alratica is that the conh of the woman is not perforated, or is the tract small.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it is natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is by sickness which has preceded, and that is made either by flesh not well fitted or by a subtle or thick ciph.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	And it is made either in the front of the navel, or in the ribs of it, or in the upper part of it, or in the lower part of it, and prohibits  coit and pregnancy and childbirth, and very much prohibits the menses.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	And the knowledge of that is made by regarding the metrona, if the oppilacio is apparent, properly; but if it is not apparent, then you seek that with your fingers or with the ray.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the oppilacio is by a subtle ciph, and it is proper to the two labia, then you cut and disrupt that.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And it is that you pause on the two labia pulvils, and then you place your fingers, indicating both of the masses at once.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And the woman be on her back, her thighs extended, and then extend the two labia with force so that that subtle ciph be broken and the oppilacio be opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	And then take wool and imbue it in oil and place that on the location, and pour hot water on it every day so that the incised location not be consolidated.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the ciph is thick and thick, then it is that you incise that with a spatula or with a leaf of myrtle.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the oppilacio is by carnation, then suspend that with a basin, and incise it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And be with you the medicines that make cease the flow of blood by biting, such as ahacatia, and dragon's blood, and incense, adjusted with album of egg.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	And then administer a wide lead pipe so that the plague not be consolidated lightly.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And keep that for some days and administer calgua of the dry.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then be cured with the other cure of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And some times it happens in the navel birth of other flesh, and then it is that you incise according to this manner.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if that is by a rotten abscess, to the rotten abscess which is in the navel, let no contrariety be made with iron in any manner.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter .lxxiii.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	Of the cure of hemorrhoids and of tail and of red botch that happens in the conh of the women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids so appear from the openings of many veins in which from those flow blood continuously; and as so old hemorrhoids and are made theyls.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	And already I have said in the division the species of those and their signs, and I say so those that receive cure and those that do not receive cure.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore I say that hemorrhoids and theyls when they are in the front of the navel and do not appear to the sentiment, then in those no cure be made with iron.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those which are in the orifice of the navel upon which cats sentiment, those are the ones that are cured.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And so that you put the woman in a good position and then extend the tail with the forceps, or with rough cloth, and incise those with the rays.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And then pulverize upon those of the blood flow of one of the incised powders biting, such as acacia and similar to those.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And then enpellesca her feet for an hour, and then place that in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the blood flow persists, then make that sezer in decoction of sumat and of the peels of millegranas and of gualas and of similar things.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And then take flour of barley and comfiys that with honey and vinegar and make a plaster with that upon the back of it.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the blood is abscised, well is; and if not, make adhere with two ventozas, and to the nipples its escarification.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then take wool and submerge that in the juice of coriander or in the juice of arnagloza or in the juice of guarravier with vinegar and make adhere to the location; and then cure the location with enguentz until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	But athyl rog which is of rough regard, so that you incise that which to you appears of that according to that I have said in the tail engualment.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And care for that within that is healed.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter .lxxiv.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of the perforation of the eyssedura that occurs in the womb.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Many kinds of abscesses occur in the womb, as well as boils and abscesses, and ulcers and buboes and eruptions and fistulas, hemorrhoids, and varicose veins, and phlegm, and other abscesses.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already said these ailments and the kinds of them and their signs, and their cures in the division.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And now I say in this treatise of an abscess that comes in the womb when it is of the abscesses that coalesce and heal, and if you want to know in what manner the operation of it is done with iron.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Therefore, consider if the pain of the abscess at its beginning is acute with percussion and phlegm and fever, and sometimes that redness and if it catches on that feeling, then do not cut with perforation of it, and care for it with that which helps on the maturation until the acuity of the accidents ceases.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And then have you make the woman lie on a bed that has two beds; and recline on her two and adjust her feet to the part further behind the belly, and her thighs be expanded, and place her arms behind her shoulders, and tie her with a bandage to what is convenient.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	And then the midwife follows from the right side and administers the instrument with which the orifice of the womb is opened, the form of which will come in those causes that will be done thereafter.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And then when you want to administer this instrument, you put it with the ray on the perineum of the woman, and that which of the instrument enters into the womb be no more than the perineum and lead the patient.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	But if the instrument is larger than the perineum of the womb, then have you place powders on the texture of the perineum of the womb so that it be prohibited the instrument of all instruments in the perineum of the womb.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And then have you place the vertigo that runs in the instrument from the right side and that the minister have the instrument and revolve the vertigo until the orifice of the womb be opened.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And as the excrescence appears, and it is touched with the hand and is lion and moist, then have you succeed that of the head of it with a spatula lat.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And as the sania is evacuated, then have you place in the wound a mecha submerged in rubbed oil or green oil in which be some stippling; and place the calca7 in the section in the perineum of the womb.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	And place defro the womb and over the pentenilh clean wool submerged in water in which be boiled mallows.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And then be cured after two days with gargling the which convenes to what within that it be healed.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	And some times it is washed the womb and the wound so that it is christened with water and honey, and then with water in which is boiled root of lily or of aristolochia longa, and then returns to the gargling.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the wound is deep in the womb, then have you be prohibited from the cure of it with iron, have care for it with that which have we said in the division.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter .lxxv.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To teach the midwives in what manner the living embryos be medicated when they are according to unnatural figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	Necessary cause is that the midwife knows in the beginning the figure of the natural birth by the signs of it, and is that when you see the woman express in the parts behind and desires to smell the air, and above that is eased by that which is above her of the part, and hastens the emission of the embryo, then you know that this part is according to the natural figure, and is the emission of it over its head, and the second one with that or suspended or pendant from the navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Therefore, as you see those signs, then have you the belly of it be compressed so that the embryo descends lightly, and when it descends over its head, they give it the second one, and is cleansed of those superfluities with good modification.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu .i., o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	But that which is other this part is unnatural and not laudable, for when the embryo is emitted over its feet and the body of it is emitted before the head of it and the feet of it, and the hand of it one, or at the foot of it, i.e., or is emitted the head of it and the hand of it, or at the belly of it, and fort leu is converted over its neck, and resembling of the figures of it not laudable.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	Therefore, necessary cause is to the midwife that be wise and subtle in all those causes, and that she guard against error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And I have shown all figure of those, and what kind of birth is in those by so that it be signified by it and be state upon it.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the feyt is emitted over its head by natural egrecio, and that is vehement over the woman and is made to her part difficult, and sometimes the virtue of it already debilitated, then make that sezer, or that which the women have it, and evaporates the conh of it with fenugrec coyt and with humid oils.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And then insert the metronome between the patient's small shoulder blades and cut it with that or dig it into it with your nail until you remove the humidity that is in it.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	And press the woman's belly while she pushes the fetus.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if she does not push, then cover the woman with a poultice of parsley and a poultice of fenugreek with a knife.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	And then command her, the one who is giving birth, to breathe and make that struggle with conditions; and keep her mouth and nose closed for one hour, because the fetus will be forgotten very soon.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if the two hands of the fetus are forgotten at the beginning, then cover those with ease little by little.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	But if she does not obey the instructions, then place the woman on a cradle and lift her feet up, and then shake the cradle on the ground; and the woman should be held so that she does not fall during the shaking.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the hands are not delivered and the fetus dies, then cut those and extract the remains of the fetus or take its body in your hand with a cloth and extract it with equal measure, because that one will be forgotten.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	Of the placement of the embryo on its feet.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus is on its feet, then cover those in upwards, and then turn the fetus little by little, and then straighten it, and then take one of its legs and extend those little by little.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	But when it is born into the thighs, then command her to express herself, and make that struggle with conditions, because it will be forgotten if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not forgotten with what we have recounted, then return the fetus little by little until you place it back in its natural figure, because it will be forgotten then with easy placement.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is prohibited by all that we have recounted, then take a poultice of althea and dissolved gum, and beat everything in the mortar with a good beating, and then line with that the woman's vulva, at the lowest part of her belly.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And then make that censer in tepid water, until it reaches the hypocondriac.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when the parts of her are softened, then make a fumigation of myrtle for her and place that under her.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when the fumigation lasts for an hour, then make her lie on a cradle, and then make that struggle and extend her mouth, and take that away, and press the lower part of her belly with light compression, because the fetus will be forgotten very soon.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Placement of the fetus on its knees and its hands.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus is in this form, then gently insert its hands little by little; and have the woman lie stretched out on her back, and her feet hanging down, and those lying on the sheet, and complete her hands.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And then press on her belly little by little, and then extract what is below her feet from the ears until it is prepared in the lower part.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the fetus is not forgotten, then take its feet and move those with a vehement movement, and then press what is above the hypocondria little by little until the fetus pushes to the upper parts.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	And then insert its hands and straighten the fetus little by little, and command the woman to express herself until the fetus is forgotten.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	Placement of the fetus latitudinally while holding one of its hands.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	Try to reduce the hand of the fetus, but if you cannot reduce it, then elevate the woman and make her walk.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if she cannot walk, then make her lie on the sheet, and shake her thighs with a vehement shaking, and then administer ointments which I have told you and recommended of poultices.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if the childbirth has come, then make her lie on a cradle, and then study about the reduction of the hand, and straighten the fetus according to its natural figure, and make the woman struggle and command her to breathe in herself until it is forgotten.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	Placement of the fetus on the back with its arms and the fascia of it on the side of its mother.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	Make the midwife have the hand of the fetus and then turn it little by little, and make that with ease.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is and as much as it is straightened, and then place on its vulva what we have recommended of oil and poultices.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	And then command her to breathe little by little, and when you have done that, then make her lie on a cradle and command her to be inclined on the right side, and then command her to breathe; and make that struggle with conditions.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The exit of the prepared fetus on the side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When the mother's horrifics are expelled in this manner, consider, and then cut the second with your nail until it is evacuated of the humidity.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is suspended over the face and neck of it, then cut that of the umbilicus, so that it is not retained and dies.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	And then gently push the patient's feet towards their hips while you hold that second cushion, and tell the woman to compress herself a few times, and the sir should be gently laid down, if God wills.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Exit of twins or many fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are born sometimes, and sometimes even three or four, but this is strange and rare; but it is due to natural causes, and not to life.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And count those, whether they are multiplied, one after the other, and are separated by the sac, distinguish them by the ligament in the navel of each one. And sometimes they are born gently as if it were one fetus, and sometimes by unnatural means, as we have recounted.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if some of them are difficult in childbirth and arrive at what we have said of unnatural figures, then you take care of them as we have recounted.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife is skillful and does what is done with ease and subtlety, and with delay, and is ingenious according to every figure according to what is prepared for her by the art, bringing to health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Remembrance of that which is formed in the womb from embryos and miscarriages.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Sometimes they are formed in the womb one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and sometimes ten, and it is now proven that one woman miscarries and gives birth to six, and another one gives birth to ten, the cause of which is due to the measurement of the glorious wise men.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And therefore, all that is in the science of the midwife, which is very important for that appearance of what, and therefore, it is necessary to be aware of what is necessary.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter .lxxvi.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	Of the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you cure the dead fetus with what we have said in the division of the medicine and it is not brought out, and you are forced to use operation with your hand, then consider if the woman is of sound virtue and is not with any of the accidents by which she is feared to be harmed.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then, the woman must be laid on her back on her two, and her head be inclined downwards and her legs be raised.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the minister should have those two parts tied on the bed so that the body of him does not extend during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then you moisten the mouth of the mother with humid oils and with mucilage of althea and fennel and seeds of flax.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife anoints her hand with those oils and mucilages, and then she introduces her hand with ease into the mother, and then she searches with her hand in the place where the forceps are in the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And convenient places in this: therefore, consider if the fetus is prepared that descends on its head, and then you place the forceps in its heels, or in the neck, or in the mouth, or in the palate, or behind the beard, or in the fork of it, or in the places proper of the back, or behind the hypochondria.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the descent is on the feet of it, then in the pental, or in the middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And it is necessary to have the forceps in the right hand, and to place the curvature of it in that place which is between the fingers of the left hand, and to introduce the hand with ease and place the forceps in one of those places which we have said, until it reaches the left side.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place and keep in the opposite position of it another forceps, or the third if it is necessary, so that the traction be equal, and not be extension according to its rectum only.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And be careful to every part, so that the extraction of it be eased as it is done in the case of the eradication of it.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And it is necessary in it that what is between them the extension be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then the midwife anoints some of her fingers with oil and introduces them with care and turns with those that are retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the fetus is brought out, then the forceps should be changed into the place which is higher; and do so until the whole fetus is brought out.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is outside the other, and it is not possible to reduce it by the constriction of it, then it is necessary to wrap a cloth over it; and then extract it until the whole is brought out, and incise it either at the junction of the hand or in the groin.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And thus it is necessary to do in the other hand and in the two feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fetus is large, or there is constriction in the extraction, or there is water adjusted in the head of it, then it is necessary to introduce between the fingers of the spine and split the head and extract the water, or what describes this with an instrument which is called "alundat", the form of which will come with the forms of the other instruments in the chapter which is next to this.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly, if the fracture is of great size by nature, and then the bone is inserted, or the bone is pressed together as we have said, then extract the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is pulled out and is constricted by the clavicle, then it is split until the moisture which is in the feet is poured out.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not complicated, nor does it obey easily, then you insert the head as soon as it is possible to you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the bowels of the belly are abscesses or are in them hydrops, then you must pierce that until the moisture which is in them runs out.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the fetus is on its feet, then the traction of it is lighter and the direction of it to the mouth of the womb is lighter.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is constricted by the belly and the feet, then you must extract that with a cloth which you will have enveloped over your hand, and that you make the belly and the feet until the water which is in those runs out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other members are stayed and the head returns, then the midwife inserts her left hand; but if the mouth of the womb is obstructed, then she inserts her hand into the perineum, and seeks with that the head, and pulls it with her fingers into the mouth of the womb, and then inserts into it a hook, or two hooks, and pulls it with those.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the womb is constricted by an abscess, a cautery which happens to the one, then it must not be trebled over it; abandon it, then administer an infusion of moist fatty causes.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And administer plasters; and follow the patient in waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fetus is on its side, then if possible, it is pricked; and it is administered the water that we have said in the living fetus.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then it is incised in parts, and it is extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And you must leave no cause of the second birth.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all your operation, then administer the water that we have said of the cure in the abscesses caused by the one.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there occurs a flux of blood, then send them down in astringent waters and administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in whose belly was a dead fetus, and then over that fire another pregnancy, and then a dead fetus is the other.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened to one a long time ago an abscess in his navel; and it inflated until a fire opened, and it began to throw out pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to the cure of him, and medicated him for a long time, and the plague was not consolidated.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I placed on him some causes of plasters of strong traction, and extracted from him a bone, and after passing some days, and extracted another bone; and I was too amazed, as in the belly there were no bones.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were of the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Therefore I pursued the plague, and extracted from him more bones, the woman existing in her thousands of dispositions, and already living in such a manner for a long time, correcting of her a little of pus.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I do not affirm that it is strange, but that in this there is science and help to what the physician artifices with his hand for the cure administers.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of a forceps with which the womb is opened:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a stretcher in which the free ends are engaged, to the engagement of which two forceps are at the two extremities of two futz.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	But however this forceps must be more subtle than the stretcher, and be made either of ivory or of wood.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And its width of each rod is two fingers and the margin of each one is one finger, and the length of each one is one palm and a half; and in the middle place of two rods are two adjustments of that same half rods, of which the length is the majority of one palm and a little more, and the width of each one is two fingers, or a little less.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two additions are inserted into the mouth of the womb so that it may be opened with those when you revolve the two prescribed forceps.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another form similar to that more subtle and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It is made of ivory rods or wood according to the resemblance of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	But however, at the extremity of it are two additions as well, and the length of those additions is about one palm, and the width of each one is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And as you want with those to open the womb, then you make the woman lie on the bed with her feet dangling, open what is between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument as you do with forceps engaging according to the quantity that you want of the opening of the mouth of the womb until the midwife makes it so that you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of vertigo that the ancients said:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	The form of impellent that is pushed by the feet:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	The form of amisadat2 that is contained by the great head
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is assembled like forceps, with its teeth at the end, sometimes, and some times it is made long like forceps according to this form, sometimes, with its teeth like the teeth of a saw, with which it is incised and contained.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	The form of amisadat few:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	The form of a hook having a spine:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	The form of a hook having two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	The form of forceps with its teeth of lock, with which the head of the fetus is contained:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	The form of a spatula having two extremities with which the head is severed:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	The form of two spatulas wide:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All of those instruments are exercised, and when more are multiplied the species of it and are prepared by the artificers, as much as it is lighter to their operation and more useful to men by their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And in the works of those instruments, whatever they may be, you should always be prepared, because the need for them is never excusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of extraction of the secundina.
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the secundina is retained from the childbirth, then you command the patient to hold her breath, and then make her stir with condition, and strengthen your hand over her mouth and over her nostrils, and if by this it is expelled outside, it is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then you take a bowl and perforate in the cover a hole and place in that herbs boiling the mouth of the mother, as such as wormwood and rue and anise and chamomile and sicados arabic and cinnamon and centaury.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All of these herbs or some of them are submerged in water in the bowl, and place that on the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a tube of cane in the mouth of the mother, and keep that inside so that the vapor comes to the cavity of the mother.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then make her stir as we have said, and the secundina will be expelled with velocity.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this cure remains and it is not expelled, then you command the midwife to submerge her left hand in sesame oil or in a mixture of alum, and then introduce that into the vagina and caress with that the secundina, and as she has found it, then take it and extend it little by little. But if it is annexed in the womb of the mother, then introduce her hand as we have recounted, and when she has found the secundina, extract it little by little according to rectum so that the mother does not feel the traction vehemently.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	It is necessary that it be changed to the right and left sides with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then it should be adjusted in the amount of traction, because it will obey and avoid adhesion.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the mother is narrow, we have already recounted the cure with stirring and with medication of the bowl with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not expelled with all the causes that we have recounted, then guard yourself that you do not tire over it in iteration of extraction, but rather that what is emitted from it to the mouth of the mother lies to the cloth of the woman, and then sterilize that with enguent and tetrafarmacon; because that will make it soften and after a few days it will be dissolved and expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it is possible, it is elevated to the head and to the stomach, and that is read to the patient; and therefore it is necessary that sub-fumigations and conveniences be administered to that.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But some of the Ancients already are accustomed sub-fumigation of nazitort and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	The form of instrument with which the woman is sub-fumigated for the retention of menstruation and of the secundina:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It is made of wood or of bronze.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And it is placed the subtle extremity in the vagina and the wide extremity over the fire, and the sub-fumigation is placed over the embers of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep that inside so that the sub-fumigation is consumed and iterate another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of cure of the unperforated anus of the child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Many children are born and the anus of them is not perforated, which already has a subtle and opaque.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Therefore, it is necessary for the midwife to perforate with her finger that opaque; and if not, perforate it with a sharp spatula, and guard oneself that it does not touch the rectum.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then place on that wool infused in wine and oil; and then cure it with enguent inside until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is opaque, then place in the hole a tube for many days, and remove it when the child will want to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And already accidents opacity of the anus by consolidation of plague or of abscess; therefore it is necessary that that consolidation be incised, and then be cured with what we have said of the cure and of the lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of cure of the fistulas that come from the bowels.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that develop in the lower part below the navel and the thickness of which develop near the anus or in the space between the buttocks.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or a tumor.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And as that swelling is old and flows from the whitish, watery humidity or a subtle pus, and sometimes from these fistulas some penetrate.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those that penetrate are known by what is emitted from them by the egress and by the windiness; and sometimes the patient uses the egress, and very often it is emitted from those worms.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And sometimes from these fistulas, some penetrate into the space into the bladder, and into the meat of the vagina; and some of these penetrate into the junction of the thigh and into the notch of the hip.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And in which it is known that a fistula penetrates into the anus and does not penetrate, is that you put your finger inside the anus, and you introduce a subtle probe of lead or iron into the fistula when there is no turpitude.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is turpitude in that, then introduce a subtle probe of lead or horsehair into it until you feel the probe or hair in your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel that at all, nor does any cause of evacuation or worms or windiness proceed from the tract, thus as we have said, then you know that it is not penetrating, and then you turn to the cure.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula is penetrating into the bladder or into the vagina, then the significance of it is the emission of urine from it and prohibition of it so that the place may be consolidated with medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it is penetrating into the junction of the thigh or into the hip and causing pain in the circuit, then the sign of it is that the probe penetrates here if there is no turpitude into the hip, and causing pain in the circuit of the part; and that from it there is pus always; and that it does not help in that medication, nor is it consolidated with an enema.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas there is no cure of all, and the cure of those is the work and vanity of the physician's leaves on which they are based.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But in that which is not penetrating and not old, healing with iron is expected according to what I will tell you, and what I have already said and proved.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is that the patient lies between your hands on his two and elevates his legs into them, the thighs being inclined towards his belly, and then introduce a probe of lead, or of lead if there is turpitude in the fistula, until you know the place where the probe penetrates.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if that feels the patient around the buttock, then cover that while you introduce your finger inside the buttock.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel in your finger the probe already by itself penetrates, or another thing that you feel between your finger and that skin or flesh, then you know certainly that that is penetrating; and therefore do not work on that, because it is not in that healing, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But however, some say that it is cured in some men tart.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And of the medication by which help is expected in it is that you ignite a subtle cautery according to the width of the fistula, as it is preceded, and introduce that ignited into the fistula until it reaches around the buttock; and then repeat that two or three times until you know that all those carns adjusted to the fistula have been roasted, which are like the quill of a bird's feather.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then cure that with poultices wrapped in border until all those roasted carns can be covered, and then cure that with medicines that generate and consolidate flesh, and if it is healed, well is; and if not, then it is not healed in any time by other cure.

E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then purify those fistula carns which are assembled to the quill of a bird's feather and do not break from those any cause.

But if flux of blood sometimes comes between you and your operation when you were inserting those carns, then the best that it may be and of the pus lighter instrument is cauterize with fire or with acute medicine, because cauterizing with fire adjusts good two habits: it is the roasting of those carns adjusted, and the abscess of the blood, the excretion of the humidities.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then cure that with poultices wrapped in border or in a caus trissat until the place gets warm, and then cure the plague with enemas of hard flesh generating and consolidating.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And so medicines in which there is astringency and excretion; when then it is restored it is already healed and you do not fear iteration.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula already penetrates into the preon of the anus and is elongated from it to the surface of the body, then introduce your finger into the anus and inquire with that.

And therefore if you feel the probe and between you and it is always made of skin or flesh, and it is proper to penetration, then it is not operation in it but according to my trust and of hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	This cause is administered in him in one of three ways: either that you cauterize that as we have said; or that you succeed that within that you obtain the concavity of it so that it is possible for you to intervene the parts and the proper cure; and do not proceed to any incision so that you do not cut the ligament containing the tail, and that it happens on the patient exactly as the will of the egg; and then cure him with what we have said that it is very strong sir, heal; or that you elongate that veil and cleanse that pus that dries that within towards the buttock, as we have said, or with a probe or another instrument of acute extremity, and then clean those carnations fistulous that are in the incision within the one where you can by percuction; and then strive to make the restoration of the whole plague with incision, and if the orifice of pus above is not consolidated, and the fistula remains open in the part of the buttock, and pus light for the patient.
